name: General Dental Checkup
description: Comprehensive oral health examination including teeth, gums, and overall dental health assessment.

process.title: Initial Consultation
process.description: Review your medical history and discuss any concerns or symptoms you may have

process.title: Visual Examination
process.description: Thorough examination of your teeth, gums, and oral tissues using dental instruments

process.title: X-ray Imaging
process.description: Take necessary X-rays to check for hidden problems like cavities or bone loss

process.title: Treatment Recommendations
process.description: Provide detailed report and recommendations for any necessary treatments

name: Teeth Cleaning
description: Professional teeth cleaning to remove tartar, plaque, and stains for optimal oral hygiene.

process.title: Pre-Cleaning Assessment
process.description: Examine your teeth and gums to determine the extent of cleaning needed

process.title: Plaque and Tartar Removal
process.description: Use specialized tools to remove hardened plaque and tartar from teeth surfaces

process.title: Teeth Polishing
process.description: Polish teeth to remove surface stains and create a smooth, clean surface

process.title: Fluoride Treatment
process.description: Apply fluoride to strengthen teeth and prevent future decay

name: Teeth Whitening
description: Professional teeth whitening treatment to brighten your smile and boost confidence.

process.title: Color Assessment
process.description: Evaluate your current tooth color and determine the best whitening approach

process.title: Teeth Preparation
process.description: Clean teeth thoroughly and protect gums before whitening treatment

process.title: Whitening Application
process.description: Apply professional whitening gel and activate with special light

process.title: Post-Treatment Care
process.description: Provide aftercare instructions and schedule follow-up if needed

name: Dental Filling
description: Treatment of cavities using composite filling material to restore tooth function and aesthetics.

process.title: Cavity Assessment
process.description: Examine the cavity and determine the best filling material and approach

process.title: Anesthesia Administration
process.description: Apply local anesthesia to ensure a comfortable, pain-free procedure

process.title: Cavity Preparation
process.description: Remove decayed tooth material and prepare the cavity for filling

process.title: Filling Placement
process.description: Place and shape the filling material to restore tooth function and appearance

process.title: Final Polishing
process.description: Polish the filling to match your natural tooth surface

name: Root Canal Treatment
description: Advanced treatment to save infected teeth by removing damaged pulp and sealing the root canal.

process.title: Diagnosis and Planning
process.description: X-ray examination and assessment to determine the extent of infection

process.title: Anesthesia and Access
process.description: Administer anesthesia and create access to the infected pulp chamber

process.title: Pulp Removal
process.description: Remove infected or damaged pulp tissue from the root canals

process.title: Canal Cleaning
process.description: Thoroughly clean and disinfect the root canal system

process.title: Canal Filling
process.description: Fill and seal the root canals with biocompatible material

process.title: Tooth Restoration
process.description: Place a crown or filling to restore the tooth's function and appearance
